title: News Title 01
description: Fake news has become an important topic of research in a variety of disciplines including linguistics and computer science.

title: News Title 02
description: In this paper, we explain how the problem is approached from the perspective of natural language processing, with the goal of building a system to automatically detect misinformation in news.

title: News Title 03
description: main challenge in this line of research is collecting quality data, i.e., instances of fake and real news articles on a balanced distribution of topics.

title: News Title 01
description: We review available datasets and introduce the MisInfoText repository as a contribution of our lab to the community. We make available the full text of the news articles, together with veracity labels previously assigned based

title: News Title 02
description: We also perform a topic modelling experiment to elaborate on the gaps and sources of imbalance in currently available datasets to guide future efforts.

title: News Title 03
description: We appeal to the community to collect more data and to make it available for research purposes
